official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to require reports on the financial condition of the Railroad Retirement Account and the Railroad Unemployment Insurance Account, and to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase certain railroad retirement taxes.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to require the Railroad Retirement Board to report monthly to Congress on the financial condition of the Railroad Retirement Account, the Railroad Unemployment Insurance Account, and the employment levels in the railroad industry. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the railroad retirement tax for employees, employee representatives, and employers.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to require reports on the financial condition of the Railroad Retirement Account and the Railroad Unemployment Insurance Account, and to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase certain railroad retirement taxes.
